list.title: Mobile Development
list.desc: Exclusively create mobile applications that work on both the iOS and Android platforms. Start with the idea, then throw it into design, and then develop your mobile application using special treatment. Start with a small device, then enhance to the next level

list.title: Web Development
list.desc: Build your own platform with special features. I create world-class sites that help you out with your own business with new solutions. No matter what platform and stack you use, I will treat it better

list.title: UI UX Design
list.desc: I can help you create a UI/UX Design for your next app product. Everything is seamlessly integrated and starts with an idea and turns into a real prototype to validate the business idea. Each design comes with a lot of benefits that ensure the app just works.

list.title: Backend & Devops Development
list.desc: Powering your app with a super-fast and secure backend API I create a backend that combines the DevOps feature, so the process is moving fast.

process.title: Ideation & Identify
process.desc: In this phase, i will understanding about your business role, models, and pusposes. Ensure all requirements and idea can be implemement into a real world app

process.title: Research
process.desc: Next, i will start to doing research for entire project. This can be included market analysis, user interview, personas, competitor analysis and validate the idea

process.title: Design & Concepting
process.desc: Mowing into a concepting app, design including sketch, wireframe, visual design, prototype, usability testing and handoff the design to developemnt process

process.title: Development
process.desc: Start by choose the tech stack, consideration then moving into coding mode.

process.title: Testing
process.desc: I will ensure application become tested and passing all testing including unit, component, and end to end testing. So you can get the best app

process.title: Launch
process.desc: Help you launch the app, also some material like source code, secrets, and other important stuff will be capsuled into a single source
